sections.ABOUT:
ASWAD QAIYUM KHAN
Safety Officer
aswadqaiyumkhan@yahoo.com
+91 8521667292
I am a graduate with three years of experience in the oil & gas plant construction  as a safety officer and seven
years of experience in the construction industry as a supervisor in India. I have international HSE  from
NEBOSH, IOSH, OSHA, IRCA, HABC, CIEH, STI, IADC, IASP, ROSPA & HSI. I also have three national diplomas in
sections.CERTIFICATIONS:
Industrial Safety, Construction Safety & Food Safety from Bharat Sevak Samaj. I was responsible for safety training,
toolbox talks, ppe enforcement, workplace & welfare facilities inspection.
